question: my family is in great trouble, our future is dark, tell me any dua for our problems
answer:
QUESTION
My family is in great problem, my father lost his memory, inspite of best of medical aid he is not recovering, we lost lot of money on his treatment. Situation is getting from bad to worst as due to his problem he is removed from his job. We don?t have any relative, our future is dark, we do lot of prayer, zakaat etc, but our problem is as it is. Situation is so tough that I feel everything is lost. Tell me any dua for my family, my father which I can pray for them
ANSWER


Share:
We sympathise with you in your plight.

1. Allah is Hakeem (All-Wise). There is certainly great wisdom in your family undergoing this condition. Allah tests those whom He loves, and rewards them on their Sabr and patience. Therefore, continue with the Sabr and be punctual on your Salaat. Purely, Allah creates easiness after hardship. You should wake up for Tahajjud Salaat and beg Allah for your needs. He accepts du?aas at the dead of night.

2. Surah3 Aayat173

3. Allaahummah ikfiniy bihalaalika an haraamika wa aghniniy bi fadhlika amman siwaaka

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
